English: §PBecome the GM Nation§!
Only click this decision if you are the GM!
§PShow GM Decisions§!
Click to show all GM decisions
§PHide GM Decisions§!
Click to hide all GM decisions
§PAlly All Countries§!
Click to ally all countries in the game
§PUnally All Countries§!
Click to unally all countries in the game
§PGet Mil Access From All Countries§!
Click to get mil access from all countries in the game
§PRemove Mil Access From All Countries§!
Click to remove mil access from all countries in the game
§PTransfer GM Nation§!
Click to transfer the GM nation flag to a nation you don't have mil access from
§PKick All Players With No Mil Access§!
Click to kick all players with no mil access in the game
§PUnsiege All Countries With No Mil Access§!
Click to unoccupy all non-rebel occupations in countries with no mil access
§PChoose a Country With no Mil Access to be the Occupier§!
Click to pick a country with no mil access to be the occupier, after clicking this a new decision will unlock allowing you to choose which countries will be sieged
§PSiege All Countries With no Mil Access to the Occupier§!
Click this to siege all countries you do not have mil access with to the occupier you picked earlier
§PBan Land Transfers§!
Prevents players from using all the land transfer CBs (Negotiated State, Negotiated Substate, & Third Party Transfer)
§PAllow Land Transfers§!
Enables players to use all the land transfer CBs (Negotiated State, Negotiated Substate, & Third Party Transfer)
§PBan Infamy Transfers§!
Prevents players from requesting infamy transfers
§PAllow Infamy Transfers§!
Allows players to request infamy transfers
§PBan Trade Deals§!
Prevent players from initiating trade deals.
§PAllow Trade Deals§!
Allow players to initiate trade deals.
§PGM Immunity§!
Grants immunity to all CBs
§PGM Immunity Removal§!
Removes immunity to all CBs
§PChange Tag to the Target Country
Clicking this decision will change your tag to the target country.
§PEnable Host Flag Following Tag Changes§!
Clicking this decision will make it so when you change tag, the host nation flag will follow to the nation you swap to.
§PDisable Host Flag Following Tag Changes§!
Clicking this decision will disable the host flag following your tag swaps again.
§PSet a Player to Tag Switch to a Target Country§!
Click this decision to set a target country as the player to move to the destination tag with the next decision.
§PSet The Destination Tag to a Target Country§!
Click this decision to set a target country as the destination tag, and move the initially selected player to said tag.
§PReset Tag Switch Selection§!
Clicking this decision will reset the countries flagged for tag swaps.
